role.argrole: in what? (if not part of Arg1)

example.parse: (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM صحيح)) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC النقيب) (NOUN_PROP ملحم) (NOUN_PROP كرم)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS فاز) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN التزكية) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاجماع))) (S-ADV (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_INDEF_ACC مترجما) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC تأييد) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN كل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN زملائ) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))) (PP-CLR (PP (PREP ل) (NP (PRON_3MS ه))) (CONJ و) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لجهود)) (SBAR (WHNP (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS بذل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (PVSUFF_DO:3FS ها)) (PP-TMP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN مدى) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN عقود)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الزمن))))))))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: for him and the efforts he made over the decades

example.arg: له وللجهود التي بذلها على مدى عقود من الزمن
